isNaN(x=+x)?unknown:(x=0.5+((x=+transform(x))-t1)*(s*x<s*t1?k10:k21),interpolator(clamp?Math.max(0,Math.min(1,x)):x));}scale.domain=function(_){return arguments.length?(unknown=_,scale):unknown;};return function(t){transform=t,t0=t(x0),t1=t(x1),t2=t(x2),k10=t0===t1?0:0.5/(t1-t0),k21=t1===t2?0:0.5/(t2-t1),s=t1<t0?-1:1;return scale;};}export default function diverging(){var scale=linearish(transformer()(identity));scale.copy=function(){return copy(scale,diverging());};return initInterpolator.apply(scale,arguments);}export function initInterpolator.apply(scale,arguments);}export function divergingSqrt(){return divergingPow.apply(null,arguments).exponent(0.5);}
